img_summary: The image depicts a gourd item featured in the video game *Black Myth: Wukong*. Based on the preceding text, this specific gourd is associated with the "Graceful Orchid," an Epic item that provides a temporary health recovery effect when used. It is obtained by giving 15 seeds to Chen Loong in The New West. The gourd's design aligns with its in-game functionality and narrative significance.
